<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Log out for the user by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/security/activeconnections/logoutall/{userId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Logs out from all the active connections for the user with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"userId","in":"path","description":"The user ID extracted from the route parameters.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"aae1e103-bca5-9fa1-ba8c-42058b4abf28"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Ok"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"403":{"description":"Method not available"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
